item.name: Patio Table
item.description: A white oak picnic table which includes a raisable middel extension leaf to increase the length of the table for that extra large garden party.

item.name: Adirondack Chair
item.description: With its form fitting seat, thick, oversized arm paddles, timely contour back support, our Adirondack Chair offers the ultimate in design and comfort. This chair can also be made in a miniature version that is perfect for that special stuffed toy of your child.

item.name: Trellis Gate
item.description: A unique cedar wood gate designed as an entrance to your yard or garden. This gate makes a statement about the style of your yard.

item.name: Bird Feeder
item.description: This striking octagonal feeder will be the focal point of your yard. The pine exterior has a cedar shingle roof and can sit on top of a 4x4 (inch) post.

item.name: Lutyen Bench
item.description: The Lutyen bench is a stylish addition to any outdoor setting. Made of cedar, and is 77 inches wide, 3 people can easily be seated in the contoured seat. All of the joints in the bench are mortise and tenon so that the bench is assured to last.
